channel.title: TGaceAllStories

item.title: Apple is blowing its chance for AI leadership — but what else would you expect?
item.description: Apple no longer innovates —instead, it waits. And with AI, anyone playing it safe will get left behind.

item.description: “I have about $80,000 in my 401(k) and $10,000 in savings.”
